name: Venere, Videre, Vincere
description:
Welcome to Venere, Videre, Vincere, or VVV for short!

This isn't as much a game as a simulation, of many countries fighting against each other on a map. 

Controls:

1. Mouse Wheel - Zoom in and out of the game

2. WASD/Arrow Keys - Move the Camera Around

This is one of my long-term projects to which I intend to add a great many things, but for now, here are the present features:

1. The possibility to generate a square map of customizable size

2. 2 pre-built maps - one of Europe and the Mediterranean, and one of a set of islands

3. The ability to add Custom Civilizations(with their own color and naming), which can spawn in the game.

4. The ability to add Custom Maps, by converting any PNG or JPG image to green, yellow and blue.

5. Civilizations expanding into unclaimed territory, and attacking each other

______________________________________________________________________________________

I have a great many things planned, so the game in its current state is very much WIP.
